ygData.subject: Re: MANA RING QUESTION . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: It only adds to your total mana.. there are other gems that speed up mana regen, but you ll have to wait to much much much higher lvls to get to it. Tandayen,
ygData.messageBody:
It only adds to your total mana.. there are other gems that speed up mana regen, but you'll have to wait to much much much higher lvls to get to it.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ WIZARDS <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 12:39 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] MANA RING QUESTION . . .


OK I was told that the mana ring was +5 mana and it helps you regenerate your mana FASTER while meditating . .. so this guy wanted 10PP for it and I was like grrrrrrr OK cus I thought "hey! +5 mana AND faster regen!!"

but I just read a post that said that it DOESN'T help regen . . pls say it ain't so. Any info on mana items would be most appreciated.

Thanks!

Mata
L12 Wiz High Elf on ECI...
